ComicInfo.Summary:
Elizabeth continues the story of her life before living death. After a hot and heavy fling with the Varcolaci, Elizabeth returns home to a willing husband and they have four children together. Her husband dies and the years pass. Elizabeth is obsessed with her aging beauty. Believing that blood is the fountain of youth, she murders young virgins and bathes in their blood. She begins to eat their flesh. Her murderous orgies earn her the name Bloody Countess. Finally, the King of Hungary orders her arrest. Though her accomplices are executed, she is imprisoned in her castle. She dies at the age of 54, but in the womb of the earth she is reborn to the shadow world of the undead. As she emerges from her tomb, the Varcolaci is waiting for her. To his surprise, she eagerly attacks him and sucks his blood. This series is truly the deepest comic book Eros Comix has ever published. Warning: violent sexual situations.
